issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

comments.body:
Dmitry

I imagine the ticket was closed, because it didn't include any of the necessary information. Please see the [Jira Ticket Checklist|http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/Contributing+to+Titanium#ContributingtoTitanium-Summary%3AJiraTicketChecklist] for more guidance on this.

Would you post a comment at the other bug, and (politely) ask Stephen to provide some links to relevant tickets. Please be aware that he's a very busy guy, but also typically extremely helpful. Thus, I am certain that he did not mean to leave you with half an answer, and will gladly provide the information you need.

Thanks

Paul, if I could post a comment in any corresponding bug, I would definitely do it (like here in TISTUD-465, for example). But I can't post comment in the mentioned TIMOB-384, and, as I have already said, I can't find any other bug on that topic. If there's any way to get information from Stephen, please let me know about that. 
In common: it would great to see duplicate links on such issues. This is JIRA workflow politeness, I believe.

Dmitry

You should definitely be able to post comments in the TiMob project. I will investigate this. Once resolved, I will let you know, so you can action my previous advice.

Thanks

Dmitry

This has been resolved. Thanks for bringing it to our attention, and for your patience.

Cheers

Thanks!

I have posted my comment, hope that Stephen will find time to answer it.
